ðŸ”® Arcana API

A Comprehensive RESTful Tarot API

Getting Started

Welcome to the Arcana API! Built with care for developers and tarot enthusiasts alike, this comprehensive REST API provides everything you need to explore the world of tarot.

With rich metadata (including images from the Rider-Waite deck), detailed card meanings, intuitive endpoints, and flexible filters, the Arcana API is designed to make integrating tarot into your project simple and fun.

Whether youâ€™re building an app, designing a game, or just exploring - youâ€™re in the right place!
BASE URL: https://arcana-api.onrender.com/

Endpoints

GET /cards

Retrieve a list of all tarot cards in the deck

[
  {
    "id": "fool",
    "name": "The Fool",
    "arcana": "major",
    "suit": null,
    "number": 0
  },
  // ... more cards
]
GET /cards/name/:name

Get detailed information about a specific tarot card by name

{
  "id": "fool",
  "name": "The Fool",
  "arcana": "major",
  "suit": null,
  "number": 0,
  "meanings": {
    "upright": ["New beginnings", "Innocence", "Adventure"],
    "reversed": ["Recklessness", "Risk-taking", "Second-guessing"]
  },
  "description": "The Fool represents new beginnings, having faith in the future..."
}
GET /cards/arcana/:arcana

Retrieve a list of tarot cards by arcana (major or minor)

[
  {
    "id": "fool",
    "name": "The Fool",
    "arcana": "major",
    "suit": null,
    "number": 0
  },
  // ... more cards
]
GET /cards/suit/:suit

Retrieve a list of tarot cards by suit (e.g., cups, swords)

[
  {
    "id": "ace_of_cups",
    "name": "Ace of Cups",
    "arcana": "minor",
    "suit": "cups",
    "number": 1
  },
  // ... more cards
]
GET /cards/element/:element

Retrieve a list of tarot cards by element (e.g., fire, water)

[
  {
    "id": "ace_of_cups",
    "name": "Ace of Cups",
    "arcana": "minor",
    "suit": "cups",
    "element": "water",
    "number": 1
  },
  // ... more cards
]
GET /cards/random

Get a random tarot card

{
  "id": "fool",
  "name": "The Fool",
  "arcana": "major",
  "suit": null,
  "number": 0,
  "meanings": {
    "upright": ["New beginnings", "Innocence", "Adventure"],
    "reversed": ["Recklessness", "Risk-taking", "Second-guessing"]
  },
  "description": "The Fool represents new beginnings, having faith in the future..."
}
